events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but I would like to request a refund because the size does not fit me at all.
The system has reviewed the customer's message and classified the issue as a Refund request due to size-related return.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. to handle the refund inquiry and assist with the return process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for the jacket you purchased due to sizing issues.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can assist you further with the return?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is too small despite the size chart, so I would like to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick help! I appreciate the prepaid label and clear instructions for the return.
Your refund case is now resolved. Once we receive the returned jacket, your payment will be refunded within 5 business days.
We are following up to confirm receipt of your returned jacket and remind you that your refund will be processed shortly.
